overview: A loner, Heath, short for Heather is mesmerized when the town's iconic Drag King, Sasha takes an interest in her and even seduces her. The fact that Sasha is dead and only Heath can see her is lost on Heath and us. Despite Heath knowing Sasha was killed mysteriously, Heath continues to seemingly follow Sasha around like a puppy consoling her and as a friend with benefits. Heath is taken by the magnetic Sasha into the sexy, seductive world of DRAG KINGS.
title: Drag King
